jml.math.sparse
Class SparseRealVector

java.lang.Object
  jml.structures.SparseVector
      jml.math.sparse.SparseRealVector
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class SparseRealVector
extends SparseVector

Title: SparseRealVector

Description: Stores a vector with the positions of a vector where that positions

have a value different of the default value, the value maybe different for every position.

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2004

Company: Universidad Nacional de Colombia

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jonatan Gomez

sum

public void sum(SparseRealVector y)
Adds to the point the given point. The addition process is component by component xi = xi + yi for all i=1..n

Parameters:
y - The point to be added

substract

public void substract(SparseRealVector y)
Substracts to the point the given point. The substraction process is component by component xi = xi - yi for all i=1..n

Parameters:
y - The point to be substracted
